attributes.action: all places of rest, cemeteries and crematoriums, secured with cameras
attributes.additional_details: These places are constantly being disrespected. Dog walkers allow their dogs to foul on loved ones graves, items are stolen or destroyed and frequently local sporting clubs fans are parking on the grass where beloved family and friends lie
attributes.background: We want the government to provide relevant funding so that all local authorities can provide relevant security in cemeteries and crematorium.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575771
